title: Income Restricted 2-Bed – Priced Well Below Market Prices
posting_body: Please visit our website for income restrictions:
Wakefield Vista, Income Restricted Apartments, offers exceptional apartment living in a serene, desirable location just outside Boston.
Less than a half-mile from I-95 and only 1 mile from I-93, your commute has never been better.

Leading employers such as Oracle, Raytheon, Green Mountain Coffee Roasters, and the Lahey Clinic are just a few miles away from our Wakefield apartments and are popular retail and dining destinations such as Burlington Mall and Market Street Lynnfield.
Residents enjoy modern apartments with quality finishes as well as exclusive amenities, including a fitness center and clubroom.
In Unit Washer & Dryer ♦ Air Conditioning ♦
Actual floor plans of available vacancies may vary.
You will be provided the actual floor of the available apartment if we reach you on the waitlist.
Will the affordable units be able to rent parking?
If so, garage or off street and how much per month?
Not included in rent, additional monthly rental cost
What utilities are the renters responsible for?
Tenants are responsible for all utilities.
